description: For many years, people throughout the world have dealt with the limitations of traditional digital files. Google Drive removes those barriers. No longer will you need to deal with cumbersome attachments, multiple USB sticks, lost data and even Microsoft Office. Drive provides a whole new way to organize, track, and back up your data. But, that's only the beginning! Once files are in Google Drive, they can be easily shared with others. Work together with real-time collaboration and get rid of that old fashioned "My Documents" once and for all. This class will teach you everything you need to know to master Google Drive.
title: Master Google Drive
